content: Welcome to your new project! I can help you edit it however you want. What would you like to do?
Put a form to select the favourite fruit for each user
To add a form for selecting the user's favorite fruit, you need to drag and drop a form component from the "Components" tab into your canvas. After that, I'll guide you through customizing it.

function.arguments: {"component_id":"Header1732110725","change_description":"Add a form to select the user's favorite fruit. The form should include a drop-down menu with options such as Apple, Banana, Orange, and Grape.","acknowledgement_message":"Adding the form to the header component..."}
function.name: EditFrontendComponent

content: Adding the form to the header component...
The form to select the user's favorite fruit has been added to the header component. Would you like to do anything else?
